About Work

Background

This is a minimal visualization using Spotify's API. This app make calls to Spotify endpoints to grab the current playing song and renders the JSON data to display the title, artist and current position of the song, which is synced with a music progress bar below. Two of the last playing songs also appear below.

Since Spotify's access tokens refresh every hour, I've coded the call for a refresh token to refresh every 50 minutes in the background for a seamless experience.

Skills

  • CSS (Flexbox)
  • jQuery
  • AJAX
  • API development
